title: Streaking for Mother
description: How far would you go to help the people you love? Ashley, a narcissistic, professional sportsman with anger issues, tries to find redemption by helping a man whose life he inadvertently shattered. Guilt-ridden and on a bender, his world spirals towards disaster until he is saved by an unlikely group of troubled misfits who seek his help. Ashley is initially reluctant but acquiesces after suspecting there is more to their actions and motive and driven by his estranged mother from beyond the grave.
author: Mark Shearman
